title: How to Make Caramel Coated Cheetos

steps.headline: Melt the butter in your microwave for 20 seconds.
Combine butter, brown sugar, corn syrup, and salt in your 3 quart saucepan.
Put the stirred caramel mixture on the stove, stirring constantly until bubbling.
steps.description: Leave on the stove for 2 minutes.

steps.headline: After the caramel is done, add the baking soda, cream of Tartar, and the vanilla.
Empty both bags of Cheetos into the pan and put the Cheetos inside the oven after it is preheated.
Take the Cheetos out of the oven.
Pour the caramel mixture on the Cheetos, covering them evenly.
steps.description: Don't stir the Cheetos while pouring, as this may mess up your aim and make the coating uneven.

steps.headline: After coating evenly, mix the Cheetos up.
steps.description: Using the silicone spatula, mix the Cheetos slowly, taking care not to spill the caramel; it is still hot.

steps.headline: Using the same oven you prepped the Cheetos in, pop the Cheetos in the oven for one hour.
steps.description: Every 15 minutes, open the oven, stir, and close the oven.

steps.headline: After the 1 hour is up, cool the Cheetos for 15 minutes before serving.

text: Making the Caramel Melt the butter in your microwave for 20 seconds.  Combine butter, brown sugar, corn syrup, and salt in your 3 quart saucepan.  Put the stirred caramel mixture on the stove, stirring constantly until bubbling. Leave on the stove for 2 minutes. After the caramel is done, add the baking soda, cream of Tartar, and the vanilla. Mix extremely well. Coating the Cheetos Preheat the oven to 250 degrees.  Empty both bags of Cheetos into the pan and put the Cheetos inside the oven after it is preheated. Cook for about 10 minutes. Take the Cheetos out of the oven.  Pour the caramel mixture on the Cheetos, covering them evenly. Don't stir the Cheetos while pouring, as this may mess up your aim and make the coating uneven. After coating evenly, mix the Cheetos up. Using the silicone spatula, mix the Cheetos slowly, taking care not to spill the caramel; it is still hot. Serving Using the same oven you prepped the Cheetos in, pop the Cheetos in the oven for one hour. Every 15 minutes, open the oven, stir, and close the oven. After the 1 hour is up, cool the Cheetos for 15 minutes before serving.  Finished.
